DOC.brief_summary: Hypotheses : High definition manometry ( HDM ) safe feasible human ; HDM accurately characterize anorectal anatomy function healthy human ; HDM provide comparable information regard structure function anorectal region , obtain ano-rectal manometry anal ultrasonography ( AUS ) , patient fecal incontinence constipation . Methods : 20 healthy volunteer , 20 patient fecal incontinence , 20 patient constipation recruit . Because anorectal disorder common woman , investigator recruit approximately 8 men 12 woman group . Each subject undergo anorectal manometry , anal ultrasound high definition manometry . Data Analysis : Spearman correlational analysis perform compare parameter list . Also , diagnostic yield anal ultrasonography v HDM identify anatomic sphincter defect assess .
DOC.criteria: For patient : 1 . Either fecal incontinence ( occurrence least one episode involuntary discharge stool matter per week ) constipation ( Rome III criterion ) ( 16,17 ) 2 . Adults age 1880 yr . For healthy volunteer : 1 . Adults age 1880 yr 2 . No gastrointestinal symptom 1 . Rectal prolapse anal fissure physical examination 2 . Recent pelvic rectoanal surgery ( < 6 month ago ) 3 . History pelvic irradiation .
